extendedInfo.description: DrawExpress is a fast gesture-recognition diagram application.  With DrawExpress, you can draw diagrams and flowcharts in a simple and intuitive way. It's just as easy as using a pen and paper! Whether you work in software design, finance, business, law, or need it for school, DrawExpress is the ultimate solution to your diagramming needs. Try out the free DrawExpress Lite version before your purchase to see if DrawExpress is right for you! Visit www.drawexpress.com for more details.What can you can draw with DrawExpress?Software UML and Network Designs:- Use case Diagram- Sequence Diagram- Class Diagram- State Diagram- ER Diagram- Data Flow Diagram- Network DiagramBusiness Processes and Mind Maps:- Flowchart- Organization Chart- Process Flow- Mind map- Feature List- Decision Tree- Visual NotesNOTE: DrawExpress can be exported to PNG, SVG, and DE (DrawExpress) format and share with Dropbox and Email.NOTE: DrawExpress LITE Version has a limit of 5 diagrams.Here are some helpful starting tips:-          To span the surface of your device, use two fingers and maintain the spacing between them. It is easiest to use the thumb and index finger.-          When selecting a shape or group of shapes for deletion, you can do so by drawing "x".-          When selecting a shape or group of shapes for copying, you can do so by drawing "x".-          If you inadvertently draw unwanted lines or unrecognized shapes in red strokes, do NOT use the undo button. Simply touching the screen with two fingers will clear these lines. Also, if you ignore the lines and continue to draw over them with a successful shape or action, the unwanted lines will automatically disappear. -          When drawing connectors, try to start in the middle of the first shape and end your connector stroke within the middle of the second shape. Any point within the shape is fine.-          You can select a boundary box by touching its border only.  You can double tap on the border of a shape for labelling.It's easier than it sounds and actions speak louder than words. Watch our tutorial video on www.drawexpress.com to see how easy it is to use our diagramming tool.Also check out the tutorial slides on our website www.drawexpress.com.

reviews.title: Astounding
reviews.comment: Upgrading to full version after first diagram. Bravo!
reviews.author: Andrew Bibby

reviews.title: No Delete?
reviews.comment: The app is good, but why you don\'t allow to delete drawings (files) in the app? It\'s a no go for me, sorry.
reviews.author: Stefan Dunkel

reviews.title: Really cool app. Very innovative interface
reviews.comment: This app is really great. Getting precision isn\'t the easiest with your finger. But this is great for laying out rough relational diagrams. One feature that would be helpful would be the ability to move multiple objects at a time. Regardless this is an awesome free app.
reviews.author: Bob Fleet

reviews.title: Solved diagramming UX problem with gestures
reviews.comment: Usually this type of apps are a pain to use due to big menus with several clicks to select a shape or property. This app has solved this problem with gestures (Tried most of them, only have problems with arrows): you want a circle, draw a circle, you want a connector, simply connect both shapes with a line from center to center.  It only lacks (maybe it exists but  I haven\'t found it) possibility to change background design. Another thing I don\'t like is its appearance and icons which could be more professional and appealing.  Great app!
reviews.author: Otger Ballester

reviews.title: Quick and easy!
reviews.comment: So simple to use, even with my fingers. Love this app for work.
reviews.author: Michael Charlton

reviews.title: Simple and intuitive
reviews.comment: Been looking for a diagram program like this for a while.   Could use more features, maybe a bit more refinement, but definitely fast with a lot of potential.
reviews.author: Whittaker Courtney

reviews.title: Very good application!
reviews.comment: It would be nice to be able to change the line thickness.
reviews.author: Ioan Dancus

reviews.title: Very impressive
reviews.comment: Excellent interface and really heads us towards systems that are actually quicker than paper and pencil. Great work!
reviews.author: Chris Bell

reviews.comment: I don\'t know how to use it
reviews.author: Mark Good

reviews.title: Good but needs to export useful formats
reviews.comment: This is a very useful app for sketching out quick diagrams, the shape recognition works very well making for quick work. However I cannot make use of the app if I cannot then export my diagrams as useful file formats! SVG seems like the obvious place to start? If I could export to Visio I would be a very happy customer! Saving these files to cloud accounts would also be valuable.
reviews.author: Rob Fone

reviews.title: Good application
reviews.comment: Very useful for process flow development, mind mapping.
reviews.author: Pornima Ankaj Dandage

reviews.title: Very frustrating.
reviews.comment: I\'m looking for a network diagramming tool.  One of the screen captures showed a very nice network diagram.  I have found no way to create a similar diagram, using this software.  Perhaps there are important features, only available in the paid version...  There is a menu button, but nothing happens when I push it.   Image Library...   where is it, or does it not yet exist?
reviews.author: Tim Kowalsky

reviews.comment: Very good. Especially for Note 2.
reviews.author: Tien Vu Duc

reviews.title: Great experience!!
reviews.comment: The best diagram draw app ever!!!
reviews.author: Jason Chen

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: Never even thought such intuitive drawing is possible, hats off! The creators are genius!!
reviews.author: Niladri De

reviews.title: Just what I need
reviews.comment: Works a treat. Some gestures perhaps a little gimmicky. Joining lines would probably look better if they lined up with the centres of the objects they join. I\'m being picky - it\'s an excellent app.
reviews.author: Mike Wilson

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: I am using this to do state graphs for an engineering class. I wish I would have found this sooner! It\'s both faster and neater than drawing by hand. Thanks for a great app!
reviews.author: Jonathan Frahm

reviews.title: Excellent!
reviews.comment: Excellent! This app is de designed for touch experience and it\'s really intuitive to learn!
reviews.author: Valentina Atanassova

reviews.title: Very well designed
reviews.comment: Wonderful and useful gesture shortcuts. Everything i have expected.
reviews.author: Tom\303\241\305\241 Landovsk\303\275

reviews.title: Love this
reviews.comment: The developers seem to have thoroughly thought through the user interface and made it right for use on a. Touchscreen. Results so far look very good, I\'m looking forward to seeing this product improve as it matures.
reviews.author: Mik Atkinson
